backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping JSON listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions and global styles with custom color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the CameraReaderScreen as the sole app view.
frontend/src/components/AudioStateCue.ts: Maps processing states to spoken messages and triggers announcements via parent LiveAnnouncer.
frontend/src/components/CameraPreview.ts: Full‑screen camera preview handling tap‑to‑capture, keyboard activation, and camera lifecycle management.
frontend/src/components/LiveAnnouncer.ts: Screen‑reader live region component announcing changing status messages.
frontend/src/components/OrientationPromp: Full‑screen portrait‑orientation prompt with an assertive ARIA announcement.
frontend/src/components/PlaybackControls: Large accessible buttons for pause/resume, repeat, and speech‑rate adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCaptureHaptics.ts: Provides a vibration helper for capture confirmation with graceful fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing identity load, login, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnDeviceOcr.ts: Loads Tesseract.js from a CDN, initializes a worker once, and exposes a hook to run on-device OCR on image files.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientation.ts: Provides a hook that tracks whether the device is in portrait or landscape orientation via resize and orientation events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because the app does not use backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Implements a text-to-speech hook using the Web Speech API with controls for speaking, pausing, resuming, canceling, and adjusting rate.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom high-contrast theme variables and accessibility-focused utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
Main screen that captures camera images, runs on-device OCR, announces states, and uses TTS with accessible playback controls.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, radii, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the accessibility-first OCR-to-speech app, its architecture, and implemented feature requirements.
